verses.verse: Then he <S%H3318>brought<s%> me out into the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north;<s%> and he <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [was] <S%H5048>opposite<s%> the <S%H1508>separate<s%> <S%H1508>area<s%> and <S%H5048>opposite<s%> the <S%H1146>building<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north.<s%>

<S%H413>Along<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H753>length,<s%> [which was] a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> [was] the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6607>door;<s%> the <S%H7341>width<s%> [was] <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

<S%H5048>Opposite<s%> the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> [cubits] <S%H834>which<s%> belonged to the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> and <S%H5048>opposite<s%> the <S%H7531>pavement<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> belonged to the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> [was] <S%H9042>gallery<s%> <S%H413>corresponding<s%> <S%H6440><s%> to <S%H9042>gallery<s%> in <S%H7992>three<s%> stories.

And <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> [was] an <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H4109>walk<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>wide,<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> [hundred] <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and their <S%H6607>openings<s%> [were] on the <S%H6828>north.<s%>

Now the <S%H5945>upper<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%> [were] <S%H9527>smaller<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H9042>galleries<s%> <S%H398>took<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> [space] <S%H398>away<s%> from them <S%H4480>than<s%> from the <S%H8481>lower<s%> and <S%H8484>middle<s%> <S%H8484>ones<s%> in the <S%H1146>building.<s%>

For they [were] in <S%H8027>three<s%> stories and <S%H369>had<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> like the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of the <S%H2691>courts;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> [the upper chambers] were <S%H680>set<s%> <S%H680>back<s%> from the <S%H776>ground<s%> upward, <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H8481>lower<s%> and <S%H8484>middle<s%> <S%H8484>ones.<s%>

As for the <S%H2351>outer<s%> <S%H1447>wall<s%> by the <S%H5980>side<s%> of the <S%H3957>chambers,<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H6440>facing<s%> the <S%H3957>chambers,<s%> its <S%H753>length<s%> [was] <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

For the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [were] in the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> [was] <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> [the length of those] <S%H6440>facing<s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%> [was] a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And <S%H4480>below<s%> <S%H8478><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%> [was] the <S%H3996>entrance<s%> on the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6921>side,<s%> as one <S%H935>enters<s%> them from the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court.<s%>

In the <S%H7341>thickness<s%> of the <S%H1447>wall<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east,<s%> <S%H413>facing<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1508>separate<s%> <S%H1508>area<s%> and <S%H413>facing<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1146>building,<s%> [there were] <S%H3957>chambers.<s%>

And the <S%H1870>way<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of them [was] like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [were] on the <S%H6828>north,<s%> according to their <S%H753>length<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> was their <S%H7341>width;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4161>exits<s%> [were] both according to their <S%H4941>arrangements<s%> and <S%H6607>openings.<s%>

And corresponding to the <S%H6607>openings<s%> of the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south<s%> was an <S%H6607>opening<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1870>way,<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H1448>wall<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east,<s%> as one <S%H935>enters<s%> them.

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, "The <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%> [and] the <S%H1864>south<s%> <S%H3957>chambers,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H413>opposite<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1508>separate<s%> <S%H1508>area,<s%> they are the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are <S%H7138>near<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>things.<s%> <S%H8033>There<s%> they shall <S%H5117>lay<s%> the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>things,<s%> the grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> and the <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering;<s%> for the <S%H4725>place<s%> is <S%H6918>holy.<s%>

"When the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H935>enter,<s%> then they shall not <S%H3318>go<s%> out into the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> from the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> without <S%H5117>laying<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> their <S%H899>garments<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H8334>minister,<s%> for they are <S%H6944>holy.<s%> They shall <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H899>garments;<s%> then they shall <S%H7126>approach<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> is for the <S%H5971>people.<s%>"

Now when he had <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H4060>measuring<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> he <S%H3318>brought<s%> me out by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H6440>faced<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east,<s%> and <S%H4058>measured<s%> it <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around.<s%>

He <S%H4058>measured<s%> on the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>side<s%> with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7070>reeds,<s%> by the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed.<s%>
He <S%H4058>measured<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H7307>side<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7070>reeds<s%> by the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed.<s%>
On the <S%H1864>south<s%> <S%H7307>side<s%> he <S%H4058>measured<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7070>reeds<s%> with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed.<s%>

He <S%H5437>turned<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H7307>side,<s%> [and] <S%H4058>measured<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7070>reeds<s%> with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed.<s%>

He <S%H4058>measured<s%> it on the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>sides;<s%> it had a <S%H2346>wall<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around,<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and the <S%H7341>width<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> to <S%H914>divide<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> and the <S%H2455>profane.<s%>
